Manual

Packet

Packets contain data, it can be either good or bad.

You don't know the difference really, you just want to finish work and go home.

Well... hopefully you go home.

Scanning

Press on one of the fields to scan it. Some fields will take longer to finish scanning since there's more data to scan. When the scan is done, you'll be informed of whether the data is curious or not.

Remember, some people might be pinging your server, so don't block every IP with curious data

Actions

Allow: Let the packet through
Block Once: It's in the name
Block: Block forever!

N.B.

This game is not done, can't be finished, and will go on forever!!!!!!!
